Row.Text: Our Minister of Education thinks it would be a good idea for our Universties to each specialize in particular areas of research. Each program will require a small amount of funding, but it would let us better direct what is being taught in these institutions. As head of state, they will be looking to you for the final decision. I will put the requests in your office for you to review as they arrive.

Our Ministry of Education has been working with local officals to help develop curriculums for the bright minds of our youth. As the head of our national family, they will be seeking guidance from you in the coming days. I will let you know as soon a a decision needs to be made.
